posts.post_title: WTB: a couple t206's and a few c46's needed
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Andy
I'm hoping to find a few cards that I need here.  They have to be beaters though.  My budget is embarrassing [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG] 

t206's: 
- Murphy Horizontal
- Marquard hands at thighs

c46's: (these are all Jersey City players)
- Justis
- Butler
- [S]Wheeler[/S] - Thanks Steve!
- Jones
- Wells

Please email me if you have any of these cards in poor shape.  I have been giving hurt cards a nice loving home for some time now, and I would be happy to take in a few more.

edited to add: andyhuntoon@gmail.com

Thanks,

Andy
